short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Engage with content on X and earn tokens for your spreading influence with PARROT, which enhances your content social experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PARROT is an innovative Web3 Content Social Protocol driving a value revolution in the content ecosystem by recognizing and rewarding creators and spreaders through a decentralized approach.
PARROT's MVP, which is this Chrome extension, seamlessly integrates with X (formerly Twitter), preserving the user experience of Crypto Twitter while introducing token incentives for content creators and spreaders.
